info.description: Create Order  demonstration with API Key Authentication.
info.title: Create Order (API Key)

x-code-samples.source:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

 MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse('application/octet-stream');

 RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, '{
	'Application': 1,
	'XpoCustomerId': 'HITPRODEN',
	'orderDetails': {
		'ContainerMode': 'LCL',
		'number': 'TESTORDERVAL12',
		'Date': null,
		'confirmNumber': 'TESTORDERVAL1',
		'invoiceDate': '2020-02-13T12:08:09',
		'invoiceNumber': 'TESTORDERVAL1',
		'goodsDescription': 'test goods description',
		'currency': 'USD',
		'transportMode': 'SEA',
		'CountryOfOrigin': 'US'
	},
	'buyer': {
		'organizationCode': 'GARUSAWTG',
		'addressCode': '360 W Plant St Ste 203',
		'Name': 'GARMCO USA Inc.',
		'Address1': '360 W Plant St Ste 203',
		'Address2': '',
		'City': 'Winter Garden',
		'State': 'WI',
		'Country': 'US',
		'PostalCode': '34787',
		'Contact': {
			'PhoneNumber': '+1 414-436-3262',
			'Email': '',
			'Name': ''
		}
	},
	'supplier': {
		'organizationCode': 'HITPRODEN',
		'addressCode': '7150 BRYAN DAIRY ROAD',
		'Name': 'HIT PROMOTIONAL PRODUCTS INC',
		'Address1': '7150 BRYAN DAIRY RD',
		'Address2': '',
		'City': 'LARGO',
		'State': 'FL',
		'Country': 'US',
		'PostalCode': '33777-1501',
		'Contact': {
			'PhoneNumber': '+33777-1501',
			'Email': '',
			'Name': ''
		}
	},
	'orderLineDetails': [{
		'number': 1,
		'partNumber': '12',
		'description': 'test description',
		'outerPacks': {
			'quantity': 40,
			'quantityUOM': 'UNT',
			'weight': 50,
			'weightUOM': 'LB',
			'volume': 7890,
			'volumeUOM': 'M3',
			'length': 30,
			'width': 30,
			'height': 40,
			'lwhuom': 'CM',
			'ItemPrice': 20.50
		},
		'itemPrice': 12.75
	}],
	'DeliveryInstructions': 'testNotes of DeliveryInstructions ',
	'PickupInstructions': 'testNotes of PickupInstructions ',
	'ReferenceNumbers': [{
		'DataType': 'String',
		'Key': 'Customer PO',
		'Value': '639722365'
	}]rn}');
 Request request = new Request.Builder()
   .url('https://api-dev.lm.xpo.com/irispoc/rest/v1/CreateOrderOAuth/Cargo/')  
 .post(body)  
 .addHeader('x-api-key', '6cd15962-94b6-411a-8f5c-3bbd06b70673')  
 .addHeader('token', 'eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IkU1OEQ3N0M3MEE2MkRCMUQwMDYwODRCNUNCREI0QkVBMUJGRjhGM0YiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJ4NXQiOiI1WTEzeHdwaTJ4MEFZSVMxeTl0TDZodl9qejgifQ.eyJuYmYiOjE1ODU1NTI1ODEsImV4cCI6MTU4NTU1OTc4MSwiaXNzIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9sb2dpbi1zYW5kYm94LmF1dGh4cG8uY29tIiwiYXVkIjpbImh0dHBzOi8vbG9naW4tc2FuZGJveC5hdXRoeHBvLmNvbS9yZXNvdXJjZXMiLCJ4cG8tcmF0ZXMtYXBpIl0sImNsaWVudF9pZCI6Inhwby1rcmFmdC1oZWluei1pbnRlZ3JhdGlvbiIsInNjb3BlIjpbInhwby1yYXRlcy1hcGkiXX0.NApIxCwAMKA9PtZ5Opbcj7ZvsNh_praJOZdTNBByxYzo2n4xwqH2KrA15jt_lHU_xrGkNZmmLDkrjpU4JCHjfw1xXD3oTh5BUsmEN1ErOpfSnagwPkZpY-LuAuDm55rQHvxxEeSIWdXuwM98wVZc8VbGc9N4bEaNlWXmJXm6UXicgC3rCmwVm3ukNainpR7B24MMDfxPTGB94p4MllCpT-dlVm_1BKrkYnHI_Zz_WKwQ8vgsIfDWVWG3NAXHrGmys6LZmnb6Somu7rv5AdcW29N4hDyPoXKCnCJcEtypdGMeAijR9tK1cN1bM40EJ_bAIYYVn_xdriffgDBBUekE4g')  
 .addHeader('cache-control', 'no-cache')  
 .addHeader('postman-token', '456e71d6-5eda-c109-78a9-eb3d04b5aa7e')  
 .build();

 Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

400.description: Bad Request - There are miscellaneous errors with the request, for example, mismatches between the request and what is allowed for the operation.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large - The request data was too large. This is based on the SOA Input Size quota.

500.description: Internal Server Error - This generic error message appears when an unexpected condition was encountered and a more specific message is not suitable.

503.description: Service Unavailable - The caller has hit a throttle or the request was rejected because the Atom is starting or stopping.

522.description: Connection Timed Out - This message is returned to the client when the SOA Worker Maximum Execution Time has been exceeded.
